mapper.update:
update club_team_building
club_id = #{clubId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
presentor = #{presentor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recommend = #{recommend,jdbcType=TINYINT},
like_amount = #{likeAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
comment_amount = #{commentAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update club_team_building set club_id = #{clubId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, presentor = #{presentor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recommend = #{recommend,jdbcType=TINYINT}, like_amount = #{likeAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comment_amount = #{commentAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select t1.id,t1.club_id as clubId,t1.presentor,t1.gmt_create as gmtCreate, t1.title,t1.content,t1.like_amount as likeAmount, t1.comment_amount AS commentAmount,t1.recommend, t2.nickname as presentorName,t2.header from club_team_building t1 left join user_account t2 on t1.presentor = t2.id where t1.club_id = #{clubId} and t1.status = 0
and t1.recommend = 1
order by t1.gmt_create desc
mapper.update:
update club_team_building
like_amount = like_amount+1
like_amount = like_amount-1
where id = #{tbId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update club_team_building
comment_amount = comment_amount+1
comment_amount = comment_amount-1
where id = #{tbId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select t1.id,t1.club_id as clubId,t1.presentor,t1.gmt_create as gmtCreate, t1.title,t1.content,t1.like_amount as likeAmount, t1.comment_amount AS commentAmount,t1.recommend, t2.nickname as presentorName,t2.header from club_team_building t1 left join user_account t2 on t1.presentor = t2.id where t1.id = #{id}
